1.0.0.name: wordpress/bp-pagegories
1.0.0.description: A sidebar widget that displays both the pages and categories as a single list. This is useful if you don't care to have users distinguish between categories and pages when they are navigating your site. Optionally you can give a title to your list and you can opt to list the categories before the pages if you so desire.
